---
name: Category suggestion
about: Suggest a category for BuniMart
title: "[Category] "
labels: Category
assignees: ilikecereal1

---

**Category name**
The name of the product, should not be more than three words. Example: "Stationary"

**Description**
A clear and concise description of the category

**Products applicable**
Input this in a list, separated by new lines. Example:
- Casio Scientific Calculator FX-570EX
- Used Mechanical Pencil Set

**Additional information**
Add any other information about the category here.
